text: Ay Juancito is a 2004 Argentine biographical drama movie directed by Héctor Olivera and starring Adrián Navarro, Inés Estévez, Leticia Brédice, Norma Aleandro, Jorge Marrale, Alejandro Awada, Atilio Pozzobón, Laura Novoa. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:Argentine biographical movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies directed by Héctor Olivera
title: Ay Juancito
